documentation.purpose: Hooks for automatic context awareness and workflow suggestions

user-prompt-submit.description: Provides context-aware command suggestions based on user intent
user-prompt-submit.trigger: Before user messages are sent to Claude
behavior: Detects GitHub queries → mentions MCP availability
Provides command list for very short messages
examples: User: 'what should I work on?' → suggests /show-status
User: 'resume' → shows context from persistence files

tool-use.description: Tracks significant actions and provides workflow hints
tool-use.trigger: Before Write, Edit, or Bash tool use
behavior: Detects git commits → notes tracking in project history
Detects persistence file updates → shows which command uses it
Detects GitHub CLI usage → suggests MCP integration

integration.persistence: Hooks monitor changes to log.md, todo.md, ideas.md
integration.commands: Hooks suggest relevant commands based on user actions
integration.mcp: Hooks mention GitHub MCP availability for GitHub-related queries
